hero.title: AI to extract information and analyze complex documents with greater precision and fewer errors
hero.subtitle: Analyze, extract and organize key information from extensive documents in minutes, reducing review time by up to 70% and human errors by up to 80%, without replacing your professional judgment.
hero.ctaSecondary: See how it works with a real document
hero.microcopy: Designed for notaries, legal teams and companies working with critical documents.

stats.accuracyLabel: Accuracy in legal and notarial data

whatIs.title: What is DocumentoIQ?
whatIs.description: DocumentoIQ is an artificial intelligence platform designed to assist professionals and companies in the analysis, understanding and review of complex documents. AI identifies relevant information, reduces human errors and speeds up processes without replacing professional validation.

useCases.title: An AI platform, multiple use cases
useCases.subtitle: AI document analysis adapted to different industries and processes

notarial.title: AI for notarial documents
notarial.description: Deeds, powers of attorney, sales contracts and extensive protocols, with key information highlighted for more efficient review.

legal.title: AI for legal review and contracts
legal.description: Identifies relevant clauses, critical data and possible omissions in legal documents.

business.title: AI for business documents
business.description: Analyzes reports, proposals and internal documentation to improve decision-making.

howItWorks.title: How DocumentoIQ works
howItWorks.subtitle: Intelligent document processing in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Upload your documents
step1.description: Upload PDFs or other formats, including long and complex documents.

step2.title: AI analyzes and extracts key information
step2.description: DocumentoIQ identifies relevant data, important sections and critical patterns. AI assists, it does not replace human judgment.

step3.title: Validate and decide with confidence
step3.description: Review the organized information and make decisions with greater confidence.

benefits.title: Benefits of using AI for document analysis
benefits.subtitle: Measurable results that improve efficiency and accuracy in processing complex documents

differentiator.title: A flexible AI platform, not limited to a single industry
differentiator.subtitle: While other solutions are designed for a single type of document or sector, DocumentoIQ adapts to different processes, industries and formats, allowing you to scale AI use without changing your way of working.

security.title: Security, confidentiality and control
security.description: DocumentoIQ is designed to handle sensitive documents with high security standards, guaranteeing confidentiality, user control and responsible use of artificial intelligence.

testimonial.quote: It's impossible to return to the traditional method and abandon the efficiency and precision advantages we now have with DocumentoIQ
